1.140
1.040

0	0000	0,1,2,3,4,5, ... 15		n%1=0		n%1+1=1
1	0001	1,3,5,7,9,11,13,15		n%2=1		n%2+1=2
2	0010	2,3,6,7,10,11,14,15		n%4=2,3		n%4+1=3,4
3	0011	3,7,11,15			n%4=3		n%4+1=4
4	0100	4,5,6,7,12,13,14,15		n%8=4,5,6,7	n%8+1=5,6,7,8
5	0101	5,7,13,15			n%8=5,7		n%8+1=6,8
6	0110	6,7,14,15			n%8=6,7		n%8+1=7,8
7	0111	7,15			n%8=7		n%8+1=8
8	1000	8,9,10,11,12,13,14,15	n%16+1=9,10,11,12,13,14,15,16
9	1001	9,11,13,15		n%16+1=10,12,14,16
10	1010	10,11,14,15		n%16+1=11,12,15,16
11	1011	11,15			n%16+1=12,16
12	1100	12,13,14,15		n%16+1=13,14,15,16
13	1101	13,15			n%16+1=14,16
14	1110	14,15			n%16+1=15,16
15	1111	15			n%16+1=16

out of 11.969
2.964 was used on get_uni_rr
